Rep: Nancy Pelosi's statement expressing her support for passing the DREAM Act at Sacramento State University.
The announcement of a deal reached betwe: Nancy Pelosi, Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, and President Trump on protecting the Dreamers.
The introduction of the bipartisan DREAM: which offers protections for immigrants brought to the country illegally as children and includes a path to citizenship.
The Politico: Morning Consult poll conducted in August-September 2017, which showed that 58% of registered voters believe Dreamers should be allowed to stay and become citizens if they meet certain requirements, while 18% believe they should be allowed to stay and become legal residents but not citizens.
